ROM.Changelog:
==================== 06-16-2018 ====================
* device/xiaomi/gemini/ 7d7c768 gemini: Update cos.dependencies [Sebastian] * device/xiaomi/msm8996-common/ 212c933 msm8996-common: ConfigPanel: Define LOCAL_PRIVILEGED_MODULE only once [Sebastian] * frameworks/base/ 3e1243a Remove duplicated code in IMMS [Sebastian] 307597a Stop InCall Notification to avoid track leak [Sebastian] 8465779 Fix low probability deadlock [Sebastian] a81b5b7 Cleanup TelephonyManager's log [Sebastian] b32e892 Do not setForceUse when a2dp config without change [Sebastian] 90992b3 Do not call finishKeyguardDrawn with PWM's mlock [Sebastian] 643ddd5 fix misleading FATAL EXCEPTION IN SYSTEM PROCESS log [Sebastian]
==================== 06-15-2018 ====================
==================== 06-14-2018 ====================
* device/xiaomi/gemini/ aedd324 gemini: Update thermal configs Changes made by @MOVZX [Sebastian] 361affc gemini: State the current required firmware version [Sebastian] fa6677e gemini: Enforce the presence of MIUI 8.5.10 dev firmware [Sebastian] * device/xiaomi/msm8996-common/ 699ea69 msm8996-common: Ramdisk Update [Sebastian] fb8e983 msm8996-common: Update vendor properties [Sebastian] 6f6e263 msm8996-common: Set vendor security patch level [Sebastian] 543db06 msm8996-common: releasetools: Make modem check more user friendly [Sebastian] 519d31e msm8996-common: releasetools: Do not assert multiple time-stamps [Sebastian] 13df4f3 msm8996-common: Update to stock GPS configs and clean up [Sebastian] 96b7502 msm8996-common: Unpin pre-O camera blob [Sebastian] 3ffbe13 msm8996-common: ConfigPanel: Define non-indexable keys [Sebastian] 02d197a msm8996-common: Disable MTP over functionfs [Sebastian] 4954b1b msm8996-common: camera: Changes to fix QCameraDisplay compilation issues [Sebastian] 83424a9 msm8996-common: Remove unused camera firmware [Sebastian] ae4f851 msm8996-common: Remove cpuset foreground boost [Sebastian] 2b05177 msm8996-common: Update blobs for GPS stack [Sebastian]
